titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices of Ireland. A proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas the commissioners of their Majestes revenue have represented unto us, that prusuant to the power to them given, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin, the 27th day of February, and in the third year of their Majesties Reign.".
Concerning the tillage of forfeited lands.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. Majesties to 2) Do ut-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
